    #<Krieg's COMs>

        #<Enabler>

            #Makes it so Krieg's COMs can spawn with Legendary Parts.

            set GD_Aster_ItemGrades.ClassMods.BalDef_ClassMod_Aster_Psycho:ItemPartListCollectionDefinition_31 AlphaPartData (bEnabled=True,WeightedParts=((Part=ClassModPartDefinition'GD_ClassMods.Specialization.Spec_Legendary',Manufacturers=,MinGameStageIndex=0,MaxGameStageIndex=1,DefaultWeightIndex=0)))
